description: Installation of under floor heating throughout the Lower Ground Floor, and in the new Second Floor master bathroom. Rationalising services. Strengthening and stabilising the existing timber floor beams and joists within the building as required. Underpinning of central spine walls. Installation of a dumb waiter in the existing confines of the historic built in cupboard serving the Lower Ground and Ground Floors. Improving fire safety of the existing internal timber doors and ironmongery, replacement of the existing doors (internally and externally) at Lower Ground Floor only, with FD30s traditional painted timber panelled doors and ironmongery. Refurbishment and reinstalling of the historic floor boards throughout. Reinstatement of existing fire places in the primary room on the Third Floor and secondary room on the First Floor. Reinstatement of the handrail and balustrading to the stair on the Lower Ground Floor to match the existing balustrading and handrail profile details.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The works hereby permitted shall be begun not later than three years from the date of this consent.

REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 18(1)(a) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
